content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

let dns = uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize DNSCount = count(), 
            UniqueDomains = dcount(DnsRequest_s), 
            EntropyHits = countif(DnsRiskHighEntropy_d == 1),
            LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ProcGUID_g, Computer, ProcName_s;

let proc = uberAgentESA_Process_ProcessStop_CL
| project ProcGUID_g, ProcUser_s;

dns
| join kind=leftouter proc on ProcGUID_g
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| project LastSeen, Computer, ProcName_s, ProcUser_s, DNSCount, UniqueDomains, EntropyHits
| order by DNSCount desc

let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

let dns = uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize DNSCount = count(), 
            UniqueDomains = dcount(DnsRequest_s), 
            EntropyHits = countif(DnsRiskHighEntropy_d == 1),
            LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated)
  by ProcGUID_g, Computer, ProcName_s;

let proc = uberAgentESA_Process_ProcessStop_CL
| project ProcGUID_g, ProcUser_s;

dns
| join kind=leftouter proc on ProcGUID_g
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| project LastSeen, Computer, ProcName_s, ProcUser_s, DNSCount, UniqueDomains, EntropyHits
| order by DNSCount desc

content.title: High Entropy or Random Domains

content.query:
uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where DnsRisk52Chars_d == 1 or DnsRisk27UniqueChars_d == 1
| summarize Count = count() by DnsRequest_s, Computer, ProcName_s
| top 20 by Count desc
content.title: Unusually Long or Unique Character Domains

content.query:
uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where DnsRiskTXTRecord_d == 1
| summarize Count = count() by DnsRequest_s, Computer, ProcName_s
| top 20 by Count desc
content.title: DNS TXT Record Usage

content.query:
uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where DnsResponseStatus_d == 2  // NXDOMAIN
| summarize Count = count() by DnsRequest_s, Computer, ProcName_s
| top 20 by Count desc
content.title: Frequent NXDOMAIN Responses
Beaconing Behavior (Repetitive DNS Requests)
DNS Requests to Rare or Suspicious TLDs
DNS Requests from Unusual Processes
Sudden Spikes in DNS Activity

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

let dns = uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where DnsRequest_s matches regex @"[A-Za-z0-9+/]{16,}={0,2}\."
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize Count = count(), LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated) 
  by ProcGUID_g, DnsRequest_s, ProcName_s, Computer;

let proc = uberAgentESA_Process_ProcessStop_CL
| project ProcGUID_g, ProcUser_s;

dns
| join kind=leftouter proc on ProcGUID_g
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| project DnsRequest_s, ProcName_s, ProcUser_s, Computer, Count, LastSeen
| top 10 by Count desc
content.title: Encoded Subdomains (Base64 or Hex Suspicion)

content.query:
let MachineFilter = iff("{Machine}" == "*" or isempty("{Machine}"), "", "{Machine}");
let UserFilter = iff("{User}" == "*" or isempty("{User}"), "", "{User}");

let dns = uberAgentESA_Process_DnsQuery_CL
| where isempty(MachineFilter) or Computer has MachineFilter
| summarize TotalRequests = count(), 
            UniqueDomains = dcount(DnsRequest_s),
            HighEntropyCount = countif(DnsRiskHighEntropy_d == 1)
    by bin(TimeGenerated, 5m), ProcGUID_g, Computer, ProcName_s
| where TotalRequests > 10;

let proc = uberAgentESA_Process_ProcessStop_CL
| project ProcGUID_g, ProcUser_s;

dns
| join kind=leftouter proc on ProcGUID_g
| where isempty(UserFilter) or ProcUser_s has UserFilter
| project TimeGenerated, Computer, ProcName_s, ProcUser_s, TotalRequests, UniqueDomains, HighEntropyCount
| order by Computer, ProcName_s, TimeGenerated asc
content.title: DNS Beaconing and High-Entropy Domain Activity by Process
Suspicious DNS Requests with Command Line Context
🌐 DNS Activity by Device with Network Configuration Detailss DNS Requests by User
